metadata.title: CVE-2018-11727 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
** DISPUTED ** The libfsntfs_attribute_read_from_mft function inlibfsntfs_attribute.c in libfsntfs through 2018-04-20 allows remoteattackers to cause an information disclosure (heap-based buffer over-read)via a crafted ntfs file. NOTE: the vendor has disputed this as described inlibyal/libfsntfs issue 8 on GitHub.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-11727` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libfsntfs-utils - 20190104-1
libfsntfs1 - 20190104-1
python3-libfsntfs - 20190104-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libfsntfs package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20190104-1').
